thread.title: Why Should Unions Have Eternal Life?

author: Akash Chougule
title: Why Should Unions Have Eternal Life?
text:
When Donald Trump quipped last week that he’d like to be “president for life,” his detractors accused him of unsettling democratic norms. A single electoral mandate can’t last forever, right?
Yet that’s how labor unions work. Once a union wins a certification election, it hardly ever has to stand for recertification, no matter how much employee turnover takes place.
